name: PONG Arcade Remake
description:
Pong is a table tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. It was one of the earliest arcade video games. The player controls an in-game paddle by moving it vertically across the left or right side of the screen.

But a twist in the game is , both of the paddle are controlled by you!

The Game is developed by Rishabh Srivastava!!

{Note: The game is only available for windows  but soon it will be released for android as well.}
